solution_line_template: First add the time spent waiting for the first bus to the time spent on it: {wait_time_first_bus} minutes + {ride_time_first_bus} minutes = <<{wait_time_first_bus}+{ride_time_first_bus}={combined_first_bus_time}>>{combined_first_bus_time} minutes

Then divide that time by {divisor_for_second_bus_time} to find the time she spends on the second bus: {combined_first_bus_time} minutes / {divisor_for_second_bus_time} = <<{combined_first_bus_time}/{divisor_for_second_bus_time}={second_bus_ride_time}>>{second_bus_ride_time} minutes
